short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser Extension allows you to make comment on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The nature of this extension is to allow users to share idea; comments; make discussion on any web page.  

A chatbox-like window can be opened at any web page, allowing user to share comments.

use cases:
1. Share your product review directly on the product official web page. 
2. You want to comment on page that does not have build in commenting feature.
3. The page's commenting channel is block or not function well, BeyondComments can act as a alternative channel.
